item.description:
Westboro Indian Meadows Clubhouse is throwing a seventies party! DANCE to the music of the 70's and 80's. Held at Indian Meadows Golf Course Clubhouse, 275 Turnpike Rd, Route 9, Westboro MA, 508-366-6526 on Saturday, September 12th from 8pm - 12:30am. Buy your tickets online, or at the door. Come join us for a Fabulous Night and dance your booty off with DJ Bobby'D. http://www.acaciafunc... . See you there!
TABLES RESERVED ARE STRAIGHT IN FRONT OF YOU AS YOU ENTER THE LARGE ROOM
Tickets are ....
Singles
$10.00 Online at (http://www.djbobbyd.c...)
$10.00 at the door "Before" 9:30pm
$15.00 at the door "After" 9:30pm
Couples
$25.00 at the door "After" 9:30

You don't want to miss this... There will be prizes and surprises throughout the evening. Hmmmm!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: TABLES RESERVED ARE STRAIGHT ACROSS AS YOU ENTER THE LARGE ROOM
item.name: DANCE to the 70's & 80's music!!!
